function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Structural problems and excessive humidity caused by plants in architecture","Impact":"Damage to buildings and potential health issues from excessive humidity","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and monitoring of plants, use of appropriate building materials","Technologies":"Moisture sensors, automated irrigation systems","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, architects, designers","Owner":"Maintenance staff, architects, designers"},{"Description":"Insect troubles and odour issues caused by plants in architecture","Impact":"Health issues, discomfort, and unpleasant indoor environment","Mitigation":"Use of pest control measures, proper ventilation, and appropriate plant selection","Technologies":"Natural pest control methods, air purifiers, plant selection guides","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Maintenance staff, architects, designers"},{"Description":"Intensive energy use and maintenance required for highly artificial 'green' designs","Impact":"Increased energy consumption, higher operational costs, environmental impact","Mitigation":"Implementation of energy-efficient systems, use of low-maintenance materials, and sustainable design practices","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, low-energy lighting, sustainable building materials","People":"Building owners, designers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, designers, maintenance staff"}]}
